  • class Spell
extends Card
    The complete description of a Spell Card.
    Version:
    0.0.1
    Author:
    Alexis Claveau, Martin Ars, Maud Van Dorssen, Alexis Loret

    • Constructor Detail

      • Spell

        Spell(int id,
      java.lang.String type,
      java.lang.String name,
      int manaCost,
      int damage,
      java.lang.String target,
      java.lang.String description,
      int nbSummon,
      int idInvocation,
      int attackBuff,
      int armorBuff,
      int nbDraw,
      boolean polymorph)
        Initialize the attributes of this class.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the card
        type - There are five types : common, mage, paladin, warrior and invocation
        name - the name of the card
        manaCost - the amount of mana that the card costs
        damage - the amount of damage that the card can inflict
        target - a simple text with the target of the card
        description - the description of the card
        nbSummon - the amount of invocations that the card can perfom
        idInvocation - the card's id of the invocation
        attackBuff - the amount of the attack buff that the card can give
        armorBuff - the amount of the armor buff that the card can give
        nbDraw - the amount of cards that the player can draw
        polymorph - a boolean to indicate if the card is polymorphic or not
